hero.name: Esteban Abanto
hero.title: Software Developer
hero.description: I have experience building modern web applications, interactive video games, and full-stack solutions. I specialize in creating digital products with a focus on performance, design, and user experience.

jobs.title: Software Operator & Internal Developer
jobs.description: Development of internal tools in C# to support live broadcasts. Responsible for operating software during TV programs, ensuring technical stability in high-pressure environments.

jobs.title: Virtual Reality Game Developer
jobs.description: Design and programming of immersive experiences in virtual reality environments. Integration of advanced interactions with VR devices and coordination with multidisciplinary teams for the development of educational and simulation products.

jobs.title: Video Game Programmer
jobs.description: Implementation of game mechanics, refactoring of legacy systems, and development of custom tools to improve team productivity. Active participation in technical feature definition.

jobs.title: 2D Game Developer
jobs.description: Creation of casual video games using GameMaker and JavaScript. Worked closely with designers and artists to meet demanding deadlines and ensure technical quality of projects.

items.title: Ephemeral Chat
items.description: Ephemeral and anonymous real-time messaging app, without data storage. Built with React, Socket.IO and Express.

items.title: SOUL SWITCHEROO
items.description: Video game developed in a Game Jam as lead programmer under the pseudonym 'Baphomet'. Soul swapping mechanics.

items.title: LANZÓN MONOLÍTICO
items.description: Video game developed in a Game Jam under the pseudonym 'Baphomet'. I served as lead programmer on this culturally-themed project.

items.title: ROCKIN
items.description: Video game developed during a Game Jam under the pseudonym 'Baphomet'. I participated as lead programmer in this rapid development project.

items.title: SPACE INFINITY
items.description: Space-themed video game where I participated as assistant programmer under the pseudonym 'Isaac Ortega'.

items.title: DELTA SPACE
items.description: Space video game where I participated as programmer and designer under the pseudonym 'Isaac Ortega'. Later improved and published on the Huawei platform.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Have a project or collaboration in mind?
contact.description2: If you think your idea fits my profile, let's coordinate and
contact.description3: see if we can work together.
